column2: The writings of Terran Imperialists emerging from this historic site in §Y[Root.Location.GetName]§! impress me with the depth and passion of their ideology. I am tempted to convert in secrecy...
The writings of Neo Socialists emerging from this historic site in [Root.Location.GetName] impress me with the depth and passion of their ideology. I am tempted to convert in secrecy...
I'm a god! How can you kill a god? What a grand and intoxicating innocence.
Give up the charade of your the false beliefs you've acted upon and openly declare your true ideology.
You quit the practices of your secret ideology and concede that its beliefs were flawed.
